text: Nick L. Salazar (April 18, 1929 â€“ October 23, 2020) was an American politician. He was a Democratic member of the New Mexico House of Representatives, representing the 40th District from 1974 to 2019. He was born in San Juan Pueblo, New Mexico. Salazar died on October 23, 2020 in Ohkay Owingeh, New Mexico at the age of 91. ==References== ==Other websites== * Representative Nick L.
